api_list.name: get_user_replies
api_list.description:
Get a user's replies.

Arguments:
    id (int): a user's identifier.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://socily.p.rapidapi.com/threads/user/13460080/replies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "socily.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://socily.p.rapidapi.com/threads/user/{id}/replies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "socily.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_thread_by_url_id
api_list.description:
Get a thread' identifier by its URL's identifier.

For instance, there is the URL — `https://www.threads.net/t/CuXFPIeLLod`.
The URL's identifier would be `CuXFPIeLLod`.

Args:
    url_id (str): a thread's URL identifier.

Return:
    thread_id: int
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://socily.p.rapidapi.com/threads/thread/Cugg5xKPg9i/id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "socily.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://socily.p.rapidapi.com/threads/thread/{url_id}/id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "socily.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
